marklogic.body: yawwn, it's getting annoying how these kind of questions are being asked. people still don't learn, jay won't dish or spill the beans, so they should just give up, he's not gonna give u interesting tidbits, so just drop it. it's been YEARS now. and of course jay handled it so well. he's been a witty guy, "it's a team, i can't be selfish" he think of that on the Spot? very well done. respect for him, he's classy and he's Always the bigger person. love this dude.
